item.description:
All,

It was a great weekend of football. I can't wait for this weekend to play again. You are invited to join us. Whether you are good, bad or indifferent, our main goal is to have fun. We have a great group of regulars and have new people come every week and always look forward to fresh faces.

If you can get to the Redline, its pretty easy to find us. Get off at the Alewife 'T' stop and head toward Rindge Ave. Cross over Alewife-Brook Pkwy and head to the fields. We'll be at the football field or the grass field right next to it.

Looking forward to seeing everyone again.

-Frank
item.name: FLAG FOOTBALL - SAT 4PM - RUSSELL FIELD
